detail_desc: Slightly transparent fairy wings with a glittery print, faux fur trim and satin-covered, elastic shoulder straps. Supplied with a tulle, drawstring dust bag.
Long-sleeved, polo-neck top in stretch cotton jersey. Muscle fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s natural physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.

Soft, non-wired push-up bra in ribbed microfibre with padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps, a wide hem and no fasteners. The bra is designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with a zip down the front that continues down one leg and has a chin guard at the top. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper knitted in a soft cotton blend containing some wool with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Calf-length dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck, narrow adjustable shoulder straps, buttons down the front and two slits at the front.
Longer top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a washed look. Text appliqué on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in soft cotton jersey with lace at the top, dropped shoulders, short sleeves and a small embroidered detail at the hem.

Set with a long-sleeved hooded top and pair of leggings in printed jersey made from a cotton blend. Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a hood with a wrapover front, ribbing at the cuffs, and a raw-edge hem. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Brazilian briefs in cotton jersey with a lace trim at the hems. Low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and a half-string back.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Trousers in a sturdy, slightly stretchy weave made from a wool blend with a regular waist and tailored waistband. Zip fly with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners and gently flared legs with creases.

Shirt in a checked cotton weave with a button-down collar, chest pocket and yoke with a hanger loop at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Calf-length dress in a softly draping viscose weave with a V-neck and diagonal buttons down the front. Short sleeves with smocking and a frill trim, and an elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.

Off-the-shoulder top in an airy weave with flounces. Narrow shoulder straps and a flounced trim at the top, a concealed zip at the back and an elasticated hem. Long sleeves with a button and frill trim at the cuffs. Partly lined.
Fitted strappy top in fine-knit wool containing some cashmere.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey with long sleeves, press-studs down the front and along one leg, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hems.
Long-sleeved top in airy viscose jersey with a V-neck.
Fitted jumper in an airy, fine-knit ribbed cashmere blend with short sleeves and wide ribbing around the neckline.

Single-breasted jacket in a marled cotton weave with peak lapels, a decorative buttonhole, chest pocket, welt front pockets with a flap and one inner pocket. Elbow patches in imitation suede, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Half-lined. Slim fit that tapers at the chest and waist, which combined with slightly narrower sleeves creates a fitted silhouette.
Metal hair clips with fabric flowers.
Straight-cut, V-neck dress in woven fabric with 3/4-length trumpet sleeves with a seam, pleats and flared cuffs. Lined.
Chelsea boots with elastic gores in the sides and a loop front and back. Fabric linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles. Height of soles 5 cm.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in softly draping, ribbed jersey with a sheen. V-neck, narrow shoulder straps and a lace trim at the top.
Chinos in washed cotton twill. Casual style in a relaxed fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side and back pockets, and covered elastication at the hems.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit merino wool with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Trousers in jersey with a slight sheen. Elastication and a decorative bow at the waist, side pockets and tapered legs with glittery side stripes and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Soft nursing bras in microfibre with jersey-lined, opening cups with space for nursing pads. Decorative lace trims, slightly wider, adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
Polo shirt in premium cotton with a ribbed collar, button placket, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and a ribbed hem with short slits in the sides.
Imitation leather sandals with adjustable straps with a metal buckle. Moulded insoles and fluted ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) soles.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, button fly and skinny legs.
Jumper in soft, textured-knit cotton with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Soft slippers in printed velour with appliqués. Pile linings and insoles and soft soles with anti-slip protectors.
Knee-length twill shorts with elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist, a fake fly, diagonal side pockets and flap back pockets with concealed press-studs.

Long shirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, decorative gathers at the shoulders and a wide, detachable tie belt at the waist. Long sleeves with a concealed opening and buttoned cuffs.
Jacket in supersoft faux fur with a collar, concealed press-studs down the front and patch front pockets. Lined.
Fitted dress in woven fabric made from a cotton blend with a small stand-up collar, covered buttons at the back of the neck and a concealed zip at the back. Voluminous, lined, raglan sleeves.
All-in-one suit in lightweight, patterned sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, concealed zip down the front with a chin guard, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Trainers in fabric and imitation leather with elasticated lacing at the front, a hook and loop tab at the top and a loop at the back. Linings and moulded insoles in mesh, and chunky soles.
Short lace skirt with a concealed zip in the side and scalloped hem. Lined.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
A-line dress in woven fabric with a frill-trimmed yoke at the front and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.
Rib-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with high shafts and elasticated tops.
Leather slides with wide, crossover straps and square toes. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Jacket in cotton velvet with narrow notch lapels, buttons at the front, a chest pocket and fake welt front pockets with a flap. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Cropped, wide T-shirt in cotton jersey with a drawstring at the hem. Ribbed neckline and dropped shoulders.

Small shoulder bag in imitation leather with a small inner compartment and a flap with a concealed magnetic fastener. Narrow metal chain and imitation leather shoulder strap. Lined. Depth 4 cm. Height 10 cm. Width 17 cm.
Trousers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Top in soft slub cotton jersey with a V-neck and narrow shoulder straps with a decorative tie detail at the top. Rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a turtle neck, low dropped shoulders and wide sleeves.
Calf-length dress in crinkled fabric with a V-neck, an elasticated seam with a drawstring at the waist, and short dolman sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Jacquard-knit jumper in a soft wool blend containing alpaca and mohair in a relaxed fit with long sleeves. Ribbing in a contrasting colour around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Bikini top in lace with a decorative tie detail at the front and underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Ties at the back of the neck and an adjustable hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Short-sleeved shirt in washed denim with a turn-down collar and classic front with press-stud fastenings. Yoke at the back, flap chest pockets with a press-stud, and a rounded hem.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit with an appliqué on the turned-up hem.

Bomber jacket in nylon with a slight sheen. Small, ribbed stand-up collar, a zip down the front, gently dropped shoulder seams and long sleeves. Diagonal front pockets with a press-stud, a zipped sleeve pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Recycled polyester lining.
Long-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey.
Boxy jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a turtle neck, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Shorts in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Suede slingbacks with pointed toes, covered heels and a heel strap with covered elastication. Leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 5.5 cm.
Short jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a drawstring hood and zip down the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short, high-waisted shorts in soft twill with pleats at the front. Elastication at the back of the waist, a sewn-on tie belt at the front, and side pockets.
Sleeveless, ankle-length dress in a viscose crêpe weave with a V-neck, covered buttons down the front, a gathered seam at the waist and a straight-cut skirt that flares gently to the hem. Unlined.

Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets and legs with creases. Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Cropped top in sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Single-breasted jacket in a viscose weave with peak lapels, jetted front pockets and decorative buttons at the cuffs. Lined.
Shorts in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif. Wide, covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, pockets in the side seams, a back pocket and raw-edge hems.
Thong briefs in lace and mesh with a high waist, lined gusset, wide sides and string back.
Short, A-line skirt with a high waist and buttons down the front.
Shorts in woven fabric with a fake fly, side pockets, a coin pocket, fake welt back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Wide ribbing at the waist for optimum comfort.
Set with braces and a bow tie. Adjustable, elasticated braces with metal fasteners and imitation leather details. Pre-tied bow tie with an adjustable fastening at the back.
Sleeveless dress in soft, printed cotton jersey with a seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Slides in soft leather with adjustable straps, moulded suede insoles and patterned soles.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets, an open back pocket and raw, roll-edge hems.

Calf-length dress in airy plumeti chiffon with a round neckline and opening with a button at the back of the neck. Yoke at the top with a flounced trim that continues back over the shoulders, and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with a gathered seam at the hem. Jersey underdress with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.

Short dress in heavily draping jersey with gathers at the shoulders and a gently draped front. Slightly dropped shoulders, long tapered sleeves, and an elasticated seam with a flounce at the waist. Lined.
Short coat in a cotton jacquard weave with a small stand-up collar, side pockets and no buttons. Lined.

Blouse in airy, crinkled viscose with a V-neck, buttons down the front and long sleeves with elastication and a flounced trim at the cuffs. Flounced trim around the neckline and down the front. Unlined.

Cycling shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details. High waist with wide, elasticated ribbing. The shorts are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
